title: Dino Makeba and His Shyte License Plates

messages.raw: This Lad was as dumb and greedy as they come..He couldn't get anything right and when he did it still wasn't..
comments: This Lad was as dumb and greedy as they come..He couldn't get anything right and when he did it still wasn't..

messages.subject: Respond Urgently
messages.body:
Attn :



I FEEL QUITE SAFE DEALING WITH YOU IN THIS MUTUAL BENEFICAIL TRANSACTION.







I AM WRITTING IN RESPECT OF A FOREIGN CUSTOMER OF MYBANK A Atlanta  physician(MR.George Brumley ,FROM Atlanta.USA)WHO PERISHED IN THE PLANE CRASH OF 21 July 2003[WITH Kenya  AIRLINE] WITH  HIS WIFE (MRS JEAN Brumley)AND OTHER PASSENGERS ON ABOARD.VISIT THIS CNN WEB SITE BELOW FOR DETAILS.







http://www.cnn.com/2003/WORLD/africa/07/20/kenya.crash/index.html







SIR, SINCE THE DEMISE OF MR. George Brumley , I PERSONALLY HAVE WATCHED WITH KEEN INTEREST TO SEE THE NEXT OF KIN BUT ALL HAS PROVED ABORTIVE AS NO ONE HAS COME TO CLAIM HIS FUNDS OF USD30M,[THRITY MILLION UNITED STATES DOLLARS] WHICH HAS BEEN WITH OUR BANK HERE FOR A VERY LONG TIME.ON THIS NOTE I DECIDED TO SEEK FOR WHOM HIS NAME SHALL BE USED AS THE NEXT OF KIN,AS NO ONE HAS COME UP TO PUT CLAIM AS THE NEXT OF KIN TO THIS FUNDS AND THE BANKING ETHICS HERE DOES NOT ALLOW SUCH MONEY TO STAY MORE  THAN THREE YEARS,BECAUSE AFTER THREE YEARS THE MONEY WILL BE CALLED BACK TO THE BANK TREASURY AS UNCLAIMED BILL. IN VIEW OF THIS I GOT YOUR CONTACT THROUGH THE SCOTISH FOREIGN TRADE BILATERAL MISSION AFTER I WAS CONVINCED IN MY MIND THAT YOUR NAME/COMPANY COULD BE USED AS THE NEXT OF KIN TO THIS CLAIM.THE REQUEST OF THE FOREIGNER AS A NEXT OF KIN IN THIS BUSINESS IS OCCASIONED BY THE FACT THAT THE CUSTOMER WAS A FOREIGNER AND A SCOTISH CANNOT STAND AS THE NEXT OF KIN TO A FOREIGNER.







I AGREED THAT 30% OF THIS MONEY WILL BE FOR YOU AS A FOREIGN PARTNER IN RESPECT OF PROVIDING AN ACCOUNT WHILE 10% WILL TAKE OF ANY EXPENSES THAT MIGHT BE INCURED IN THE PROCEES OF SUCCEEDING THE TRANSFER AND THE REST WILL BE FOR ME. THEREAFTER I WILL VISIT YOUR COUNTRY FOR DISBURSEMENT AS I AM ALMOST DUE FOR RETIREMENT.







I WILL NOT FAIL TO BRING TO YOUR NOTICE THAT THIS BUSINESS IS HITCH FREE AND THAT YOU SHOULD NOT ENTERTAIN ANY FEAR AS THE WHOLE REQUIRED ARRANGEMENT HAS BEEN PERFECTED FOR THE TRANSFER.







BEST REGARDS,



DINO MAKEBA
messages.raw:

To:
Date: 15-Oct-2006
Subject: Respond Urgently

messages.subject: Re:
messages.body:
Hi,







I can't help you at the moment but perhaps you could help me.







My company is promoting a new line of personalised license plates for Africa and South Africa. I need your help with a couple of simple photos and will pay you $500 a per photo and I can pay via a method of your choice.







Get back to me if you're interested and I'll provide you more details and we can begin the work.



--



Imfulla Shyte







Shyte License Plates
messages.raw:
You know that all sounds great Dino but I have other pressing matters to tend to I'm afraid..


From:
To: [email protected]
Subject: Re:
Date: Mon, 16 Oct 2006

Hi,

I can't help you at the moment but perhaps you could help me.

My company is promoting a new line of personalised license plates for Africa and South Africa. I need your help with a couple of simple photos and will pay you $500 a per photo and I can pay via a method of your choice.

Get back to me if you're interested and I'll provide you more details and we can begin the work.
--


Shyte License Plates

messages.subject: Re: Dear Imfulla - Respond Urgently
messages.body:
Hello Sir,







Thanks for the interest. Well it's really simple. I have attached our customised license plates. Basically to promote our company we want to use African men and women displaying some of our products.







All you need to do is print out the license plates and have some people photographed placing it on their car with thumbs up and big smiles. I know it will only be paper but for all intents and purposes for the photo it will look like a real license plate.







It really is that simple. Send us back the photos along with money transfer details and we can pay you. If this proves to be a success would you be willing to work for is full time??



--



Imfulla Shyte







Shyte License Plates

To: Dino Makeba [email protected]

messages.subject: Dear Imfulla - Respond Urgently
messages.body:
DEAR IMFULLA SHYTE,







COMPLIMENTS OF THE DAY TO YOU MY GOOD FRIEND.







I HAVE CONTRACTED PEOPLE THAT CAN DO IT BUT NO ONE WANTS TO DO IT UNLESS



THEIR IS A GUARANTEE THAT SHOWS THAT THE DEAL IS REAL. THE GUARANTEE IS



MONEY IN "CASH" AND I DO NOT HAVE ENOUGH MONEY TO PAY THE CLIENTS.







SO MY FRIEND, PLEASE SEND THE FIRST $1000 VIA WESTERN UNION MONEY TRANSFER



WITH THE NAME AS BELOW:







STANLEY ABUCHI



ACCRA - GHANA







PLEASE, I DO NOT WANT YOU TO CONSIDER ME AS AN EXTORTIONIST, BUT A



CONTRACTOR AND MOST ESPECIALLY A BUSINESSMAN.







THIS IS AFRICA, THE CLIENTS MIGHT NOT BE TAKING ME FOR SERIOUSNESS BECAUSE



OF THE SIMPLE ACT THAT IS EXPECTED. POSING WITH THE LICENSE PLATES WITH



THUMBS UP AND TAKING A PICTURE WITH IT.







PLEASE, CONSIDER MY PLEA AND SEND THE $1000 TODAY FOR US TO CONTINUE.







YOU CAN CALL ME ON MY PRIVATE NUMBER:   +233-244-451732 FOR FURTHER



DISCUSSION.







BEST REGARDS,







DINO MAKEBA

BEST REGARDS,

DINO MAKEBA

messages.subject: Re: Dear Imfulla - Respond Urgently
messages.body:
Hi,







I don't understand your request Sir. You want me to send you $1,000 before I see the photos. This is very strange. I would have no garuntee of the work been done.







Furthermore I do not need people to pose with the license plates. I need the license plates placed over their real license plate on their car. Just to give the impression they have purchased and are using our product. It's a promotion.







Sir my accountants will not release any funds until we see the license plates on African cars. I'm afraid they are the terms and if you can't do the work that's fine and I shall seek the help of another.



--



Imfulla Shyte







Shyte License Plates

Subject: Re: Dear - Respond Urgently

I don't understand your request Sir. You want me to send you $1,000 before I see the photos. This is very strange. I would have no garuntee of the work been done.

Furthermore I do not need people to pose with the license plates. I need the license plates placed over their real license plate on their car. Just to give the impression they have purchased and are using our product. It's a promotion.

Sir my accountants will not release any funds until we see the license plates on African cars. I'm afraid they are the terms and if you can't do the work that's fine and I shall seek the help of another.

messages.subject: Re: Dear Imfulla - Respond Urgently
messages.body:
Hello Dino,







Thanks for the reply. I can only say that you will be paid the same day you send me the photos of the license plates. You have my word as a businessman and as a man of integrity. Just send me the details to transfer to and my accountants will do the rest.







You will not be sorry and if you are willing I can send you more and we can work together on this for as long you wish. I will try call you a little later when a get a quiet minute. Thanks for the support my good Lad and welcome aboard The Shyte License Plate ship.



--



Imfulla Shyte







Shyte License Plates

messages.subject: Dear Imfulla - Male or Female - Respond Urgently
messages.body:
DEAR IMFULLA SHYTE,







COMPLIMENTS OF THE EVENING TO YOU MY FRIEND.







I SENT YOU AN EMAIL THIS AFTERNOON. DID YOU RECEIVE IT?







YOU MUST UNDERSTAND THAT THE CLIENTS ARE DEMANDING THAT A TOKEN OUT OF THE



FIVE PICTURES SHOULD BE PAID TO THEM. PLEASE SEND THE MONEY FOR TWO



PICTURES.







I DO NOT WANT YOU TO THINK THIS AS AN UPFRONT PAYMENT, EVEN THOUGH IT SEEMS



LIKE IT, BUT NONETHELESS, I WANT TO WORK WITH YOU BECAUSE I AM A



BUSINESSMAN. A SOLDIER DOES NOT AVOID GOING TO WAR BECAUSE BULLET KILL; HE



MUST SURELY BE DESPATCHED TO THE BATTLE FIELD. I AM A BUSINESSMAN. I CAN



TAKE RISKS BUT THE CLIENTS NEED A FORM OF GUARANTEE, CASH PAYMENT. IF YOU



CAN SEND THE MONEY FOR TWO PICTURES 1000 @ 500 EACH THEN YOU WILL GET THE



PHOTOS IN TWO DAYS.







I SENT YOU THE NAME FOR THE WESTERN UNION;







MR. STANLEY ABUCHI



ACCRA - GHANA







MR. STANLEY ABUCHI IS THE MAIN PERSON AND HE IS BASED IN ACCRA - GHANA



(WESTERN AFRICA). HE HAS ORGANISED GROUP OF PERSON TO DO THE JOB AND I NEED



YOU TO CLARIFY TO ME IF THE GENDER MATTERS. HOW MANY MALE AND HOW MANY



FEMALE DO YOU NEED?







I ANTICIPATE YOUR IMMEDIATE RESPONSE.







BEST REGARDS,







DINO MAKEBA

messages.subject: Re: Dear Imfulla - Male or Female - Respond Urgently
messages.body:
Hello Dino,







I do not need an organised group. I want everyday normal people to display the plates on their cars for 2 seconds. Just enough to get a pic and a smile. I attacched a few license plates I'd like you to print out and photograph people standing or kneeling with  them on their cars. It is a very simple thing. I would prefer to pay you for all pictures at the same time and I'm not in the position to pay you before you do any work. Frankly this request has me very worried.



--



Imfulla Shyte







Shyte License Plates

I attacched a few license plates I'd like you to print out and photograph people standing or kneeling with them on their cars. It is a very simple thing. I would prefer to pay you for all pictures at the same time and I'm not in the position to pay you before you do any work. Frankly this request has me very worried.

messages.subject: Dear Imfulla
messages.body:
DEAR SHYTE,







COMPLIMENTS OF THE SEASON TO YOU MY FRIEND. MY WEEKEND WAS OKAY.







EVERYTHING IS FINE. PLEASE, THE PICTURES WILL BE OUT SOON.







I DO NOT OWN A CAMERA. I HAD TO HIRE A PHOTOGRAPHER TO TAKE THE PICTURES.







MY FRIEND, YOU KNOW I ASKED YOU TO SEND ME THE MONEY FOR TWO PLATES (1000 @



55 EACH), SO THAT I WILL USE IT TO RUN THE EXPENSES BUT YOU REFUSED. I AM



NOT A PHOTOGRAPHER AND DO NOT OWN A STUDIO FOR TAKING PHOTOS. I WOULD NEED



THE $1000 SO THAT I WILL USE IT TO RUN EXPENSES ON THIS PROJECT. I KNOW THE



PROJECT WILL BE BENEFITIAL BUT I CANNOT WORK WITH EMPTY POCKET. PLEASE



UNDERSTAND.







IF I GET THE $1000 TODAY, I WILL BUY A HI-RESOLUTION CAMERA AND GIVE YOU



GOOD QUALITY JOB. BETTER STILL, CAN YOU SEND ME A CAMERA FOR ONWARD



PROCEEDS?







I ANTICIPATE YOUR RESPONSE.







BEST REGARDS,







DINO MAKEBA

To:
Date: 23-Oct-2006
Subject: Dear

messages.subject: Re: Dear Imfulla
messages.body:
Hi Dino,







Ok well I am glad you'll have the photos out soon but in regards to sending you money and a camera, I can't. As I've explained my accountants won't authorise payments without proof of the work and it's becoming very annoying that you are hounding me down for cash.







If you send me a receipt for the photographer along with the photos I will be able to refund the cost ofcourse. You will be able to purchase a high quality camera for further projects then. If there aren't any places around your community with such equipment then I'll look into sending a good camera. We have plenty of time my friend as we've only just begun. Now get busy, Jesus is coming.



--



Imfulla Shyte







Shyte License Plates

--



Imfulla Shyte

messages.subject: Dear Imfulla
messages.body:
DEAR IMFULLA,







COMPLIMENTS OF THE WEEKEND TO YOU MY GOOD FRIEND.







I BEG FOR YOUR PATIENCE. AS YOU KNOW, THIS IS THE FIRST TIME AM INTO THIS



AND I HAVE TO RAISE CAPITAL AND EVERYTHING TO MAKE SURE THAT THIS GO



THROUGH. THE MOMENT I GET THE PHOTOGRAPHS FROM THE PHOTOGRAPHER, I WILL SEND



THEM TO YOU.  BUT I PROMISE YOU THAT AS SOON AS THIS FIRST CONTRACT IS DONE



AND I GET PAID, SUBSEQUENT ONES WILL BE DONE ON TIME BECAUSE BY THEN I WILL



BE READY WITH THE NEW CAMERA ON MY SIDE. PLEASE!

messages.subject: Re: Dear Imfulla - Acknowledge Receipt
messages.body:
Hi Dino,







I have been out all day with my prostitute friend as I had just about given up on you.







I have viewed the pics and am a little disappointed. For one the license pic is not covering the license plate on the car. This needs to be corrected. I have had someone place a license plate on your car to show you what is expected.







Secondly the pics were bearly passable and they showed the original license plate.







Furthermore I need each of the pics to be of different cars and different African people. I am promoting the plates and obviously I need to be able to show my customers MANY Africans like to customise their plates through us.







Please go through the photo I've attached and re do the pics for me. I realise asking your friends can be awkward but I'm sure you can pull it off. Have a nice weekend.



--

messages.subject: Dear Imfulla - The Deal
messages.body:
Dear Imfulla Shyte,







Compliments of the day to you my friend.







I noticed that one of the pix is of poor quality and will be re-done and



sent to you.







As you said, it is awkward asking someone to pose for a photo shot and going



to different cars to take photos. It is not easy. It seems somehow, but



nonetheless, I can do it, no problem.







Please, show me your seriousness in this whole deal. I need to get paid so I



can give you exactly what is required, because without seeing any pay from



the first deal, how can I believe that something like this is real. I can do



exactly the way you want it, different persons on different cars but I need



to get paid. I am not a photographer, I hired a photographer and he came



with his camera because I do not own any. In business transactions, capital



is required because it will be used to cater for some minor expenses during



the course. If there is no money, how can the best be attained.







Having said this, I would ask you to pick two (one male and one female) out



of the three that I sent you and pay. This will give me the full assurance



that my interest is 100% guaranteed in this deal. If I get paid, you will



surely, surely get the job done, and on time. After all, I have proved to



you my seriousness in this deal.







Waiting your response.







Best regards







Dino Makeba







PS: I called you the whole weekened, but you phone is out of service. Call



me on mobile +233-244-451732

messages.subject: Re: Dear Imfulla - The Deal
messages.body:
Hello Dino,







I am glad you understand the need for different cars and people and for the plates to be completely covered. I know full well you want to be paid. I will pay you for your work ofcourse. Of this there is no doubt and I appreciate your efforts thus far.







I cannot use any of the pics you have sent. Honestly I can't and I hope you understand why. I can't pay you for them as they are not what I asked for and are of very poor quality. If you incur expenses from a photographer get the receipt and send it to me with the new photos and I will refund you.







My accountants want proper material to justify the release of payments. Unfortunately there is no way around this fact except for you to redo all the photos properly. If you can't and for some reason want to give up on the project I understand. I hope you don't and will want to continue working for us.



--



Imfulla Shyte







Shyte License Plates

My accountants want proper material to justify the release of payments. Unfortunately there is no way around this fact except for you to redo all the photos properly. messages.subject: Dear Imfulla - Everything is good
messages.body:
Dear Imfulla Shyte,







Everything is good. Everything will going fine. But like I told you earlier,



I do not own up to ten cars, I would have to plead to the car owners for



convenience to take the photos. Therefore, this ought to be a gradual



process. I would also plead with you for your patience and understanding.







By the way, how are you and your family? I hope all is well.







Question:   Why do you not ask your colleague who pasted the license plate to put



"I'm a fanny plunge" on one of the photos, to do same to the rest of it?







I anticipate your response.







Best regards,







Dino Makeba

This is a funny mail..He's twigging..But still can't let it go..The money is just so close and he wants it..

messages.subject: Re: Dear Imfulla - Everything is good
messages.body:
Hi Dino,







It's fine. Take your time and do the best you can. My friend who did that only did it to show you what I needed to make the promotion a success. If all the photos are done that way then it's not genuine and I would lose a lot of credibility. Plus if all the photos of our Plates are on the same car it is not really believable to our customers that others are using them.







My family is fine and thanks for asking my Lad. I hope we can help both our families once we are done and the promotion is succesful. Well good luck my good lad and I'll talk to you soon.



--



Imfulla Shyte
